Function reference

All functions

World NLD_prov NLD_muni
World and Netherlands map
land
Spatial data of global land cover
metro
Spatial data of metropolitan areas
print(<tmap>) knit_print.tmap()
Draw thematic map
qtm()
Quick thematic map plot
rivers
Spatial data of rivers
theme_ps()
ggplot2 theme for proportional symbols
tm_add_legend()
Map component: manual legend
tm_basemap() tm_tiles()
Map layer: basemap / overlay tiles
tm_cartogram()
Map layer: cartogram
tm_chart_histogram() tm_chart_bar() tm_chart_donut() tm_chart_violin() tm_chart_box() tm_chart_none() tm_chart_heatmap()
Legend charts
tm_compass()
Map component: compass
tm_const()
tmap function to define a constant visual value
tm_credits()
Map component: (credits) text
tm_place_legends_right() tm_place_legends_left() tm_place_legends_bottom() tm_place_legends_top() tm_place_legends_inside() tm_extra_innner_margin()
tmap layout: helper functions
tm_facets() tm_facets_grid() tm_facets_wrap() tm_facets_pagewise() tm_facets_stack() tm_facets_hstack() tm_facets_vstack() tm_facets_flip()
Facets
tm_graticules()
Coordinate grid / graticule lines
tm_grid()
Coordinate grid / graticule lines
tm_layout() tm_style() tm_format()
Layout options
tm_legend() tm_legend_hide() tm_legend_combine()
Legend
tm_lines()
Map layer: lines
tm_mouse_coordinates()
Map component: mouse coordinates
tm_mv()
define multivariate variable
tm_mv_dim()
define multivariate variable based on stars dimension
tm_plot()
Plot mode options
tm_plot_order()
Determine plotting order of features
tm_polygons() tm_fill() tm_borders()
Map layer: polygons
tm_pos() tm_pos_in() tm_pos_out() tm_pos_auto_out() tm_pos_auto_in()
Set the position of map components
tm_raster()
Map layer: raster
tm_rgb()
Map layer: RGB
tm_scale()
Scales: automatic scale
tm_scale_bar()
Map component: scale bar
tm_scale_bivariate()
Scales: bivariate scale
tm_scale_ordinal() tm_scale_categorical()
Scales: categorical and ordinal scale
tm_scale_continuous() tm_scale_continuous_log() tm_scale_continuous_log1p()
Scales: continuous scale
tm_scale_discrete()
Scales: discrete scale
tm_scale_intervals()
Scales: interval scale
tm_scale_rank()
Scales: rank scale
tm_scale_rgb()
Scales: RGB
tm_scalebar()
Map component: scale bar
tm_sf()
Map layer: simple features
tm_shape()
Shape (spatial object) specification
tm_shape_vars()
tmap function to specify all variables in the shape object
tm_symbols() tm_dots() tm_bubbles()
Map layer: symbols
tm_text()
Map layer: text
tm_title() tm_title_in() tm_title_out()

tm_view()
View mode options
tm_xlab() tm_ylab()
Map: x and y labels
`+`(<tmap>)
Stacking of tmap elements
tmap tmap-package
Thematic Map Visualization
tmap_animation()
Create animation
tmap_arrange() knit_print.tmap_arrange() print(<tmap_arrange>)
Arrange small multiples in grid layout
tmap_design_mode()
Set the design mode
tmap_devel_mode()
Set the development mode
tmap_format() tmap_format_add()
Get or add format options
tmap_icons() marker_icon()
Specify icons
tmap_last()
Retrieve the last map to be modified or created
tmap_leaflet() tmap_grid()
Export tmap to the format of the used graphics mode
tmap_mode() ttm() ttmp()
Set tmap mode to static plotting or interactive viewing
tmap_options() tmap_options_mode() tm_options() tmap_options_diff() tmap_options_reset() tmap_options_save()
tmap options
tmap_save()
Save tmap
tmap_style()
Set or get the default tmap style
tm_squares() tm_iso() tm_markers() tm_logo() tm_minimap() tmap_grob() tmapOutput() tmapProxy() renderTmap() tm_remove_layer() tm_rgba() tmap_tip() tmap_style_catalog() tmap_style_catalogue()
